The video was uploaded to Facebook by th: based anti-lockdown page, NZ Liberty, and was shared 87 times before being taken down.
The anti: vaccination video claims that Bill Gates has a financial stake in the new Covid-19 vaccines and that governments are being bribed to purchase these vaccines.
The claims made in the video were also s: Claire Deeks, and other users from around the world.
Experts: including University of Queensland immunologist Dr Larisa Labzin and vaccinologist Dr Helen Petoussis-Harris, have debunked the claims in the video, stating that Covid-19 vaccines were developed with unprecedented speed due to substantial funding and collaboration, and that all steps and processes associated with vaccine development and testing have been followed and assessed closely by regulatory agencies worldwide.
